section1.title: IdealTechno STEP
section1.subtitle: Turnkey industrial automation: from documentation development to commissioning

section2.subtitle:
IdealTechno is the official representative of STEP, a strategic business partner of STEP industrial robots in the Russian Federation.
STEP is a group of leading companies in the industrial sector, founded in 1995. The group includes over 10 companies operating in fields such as robotics, electrical engineering, automotive manufacturing, and more.
Request the cost of an industrial robot: sales@idealtechno.ru
